DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate wear AIR OPTIX® plus HYDRAGLYDE® ( AOHG ) lenses clean disinfected HYDRAGLYDE® containing lens solution compare control habitual silicone hydrogel ( SiHy ) lenses clean disinfected habitual multi-purpose solution ( MPS ) cholesterol uptake .
DOC.criteria: Must sign inform consent document ; Vision correctable 0.1 ( LogMAR ) good eye distance habitual lenses ; Manifest cylinder ( screen ) less equal 0.75 diopter ( D ) eye spectacle add < +0.50 D eye ; Current fulltime wearer spherical samfilcon A , comfilcon A , senofilcon C monthly senofilcon A 2week replacement lens within power range lens power available ; Current user MPS ( exclude OFPM ) care lenses ; Willing answer text message daily basis study ; Willing discontinue artificial tear study rewetting drop day study visit ; Use digital device ( eg , smart phone , tablet , laptop desktop computer ) 20 consecutive minute least twice week willing continue duration study ; Other protocol specific inclusion criterion may apply . Habitual lens wear extended wear modality ( routinely sleep lens overnight 1 night per week ) ; Any anterior segment infection , inflammation , disease abnormality contraindicate contact lens wear ; History herpetic keratitis , corneal surgery irregular cornea ; Prior refractive surgery ; Any use systemic ocular medication contact lens wear could contraindicate determined investigator ; Currently use discontinue Restasis® , XiidraTM and/or topical steroid within past 7 day ; Use mechanical eyelid therapy eyelid scrub within 14 day Visit 1 willing discontinue study ; Monocular ( 1 eye functional vision ) fit 1 lens ; Known pregnancy lactating ; Other protocol specific exclusion criterion may apply .
